description:
Ichimatsu explains that there always has to be balance in the world to Jyushimatsu and a couple encounters a creepy spirit of a little girl at an old inn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: UMA Expedition Team / Punishment! / Inn / Delivery Skit: If Hansel and Gretel Were Actually Smart
UMA Tankentai / Imashime! / Ryokan / Delivery Konto: Hontou wa Kashikoi Hansel to Gretel
